parameters.definition: Amount of raw material i available
Amount of raw material i required to produce one unit of product j
Price at which product j can be sold
Cost of producing one unit of product j

description: How many of each product should the sports produce in order to maximize its profit for the month, given the \param{N} different raw materials available, where each material i has an available amount of \param{Available}, and each product j has a requirement of \param{Requirements} units of material i, a selling price of \param{Prices}, a production cost of \param{Costs}, and a market demand of \param{Demands}?
